Princess Diana's former butler Paul Burrell had such faith in her that she was the 'only woman' who knew he was gay. 
The 58-year-old has announced that he's marrying his boyfriend, lawyer Graham Cooper, in an intimate ceremony in the Lake District, just nine months after divorcing his wife. 
Paul was married to Maria for 32 years and they have two sons together. 
They have, however, been living apart for years, with Paul running a flower shop in Farndon, Cheshire and Maria, 62, living in Florida. Read More Diana's 'rock' Paul Burrell reveals he's marrying his boyfriend - nine months after divorcing wife Diana described Paul as her "rock" (Photo: Mirrorpix) 
Following the announcement, it's been reported that Diana , who described Paul as her "rock", was the only woman he told about his sexuality. 
A source told The Sun : “Paul’s friends and family all know but for a long time he kept it a closely guarded secret. 
“And for a time, literally nobody knew. He did share it with Diana while he worked with her because they were so close. 
“But at the time she was the only woman he felt he could tell.” Paul and Maria met while working at Buckingham Palace (Photo: Rex Features) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
